title: Tuesday Post Show (01-18-22)
itunes:title: Tuesday Post Show (01-18-22)
description:
We’re back from the extended weekend! Bobby starts by sharing a study that a guy holding a bottle of beer is more attractive. We get an update if Amy’s fish survived another week. Bobby shares more about what he listens to in order to fall asleep and updates us on his sleep study. Amy shares a lifehack on how to check all the subscriptions you have on your phone. Bobby reads a list of celebrities who don’t have cell phones…and how long he could go without his phone.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
